org.talares

Class Talares

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.talares.Talares

  • public class Talares
extends java.lang.Object
    Class holding the main client facing API.

    An instance of this class should be created to gain access to the API. A cache strategy should be decided upon and a corresponding instance of a subclass of Cache should be provided to the constructor of this class.

    Example: 

     import org.talares.Talares;
 import org.talares.datatypes.items.Page;
 import play.libs.F;

 Talares talares = new Talares(cache);
 F.Promise pagePromise = talares.getPage(1, 2);
    Since:
    0.1.0
    See Also:
    Cache

      • getApi

        protected org.talares.api.Talares getApi(Cache cache)

      • terminate

        public final void terminate()
        Terminates the library which implies shutting down the actor system. Should be used when the API will no longer be accesses and only then.
